name: Neon Racer (Cmski)
description:
Neon Racer takes place in a Neon lit world. 

Use pickups to rocket yourself to victory, hinder opponents' driving or blast their cars out of the race. 

Every 10 laps your placement is added to your score and you're onto the next track!

Controller Recommended!

Features:

- 3 race tracks

- 6 unique wacky pickups

- Supports keyboard/mouse and controller (controller recommended)

- 2 player enabled

If you're planning on playing this with two players please look at the known bugs!

Known bugs:

- Plug in a second controller when in the lobby rather than before starting the game otherwise the game may crash.

- The lighting in the game is only callibrated towards player 1

- The pause menu can be brought up on the controller but can only be used by the keyboard
